name: The Goobey Adventure
description:
Goobey is BACK in his second debut adventure, The Goobey Adventure, an exploratory character-switching 3D platformer set in a colorful world with colorful characters and a colorful soundtrack and a colorful story. Play AS Goobey, along with friends both new and not new, as you travel through the faraway land of Elsewhere (located about 10 minutes west of Goobey's hometown of Durdleton), and look for a way to climb the fabled Mount Grungus, an orange mountain which is said to have something cool at the top.

Features:

- Goobey

- Relaxed, exploration-focused 3D platforming

- Gameplay involving swapping between 5 different characters with their own unique abilities

- Simple, clean graphics and pixel art

- A really good soundtrack by Houston Fuller

- A story in which characters sometimes discuss their hopes and dreams and sometimes they talk about video games and pizza

GOOBEY GANG recommends you play this game with a controller, a tall glass of a nice beverage (orange juice, for example), a greatly reclined chair, and with about 45 minutes to 1 hour of spare time (that's about how long the game takes, is what I'm sayin').

By the way, GOOBEY GANG is...

Oliver Gallina

Vincent Levy

Houston Fuller
